availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W Ross (Oldham County, Kentucky, cabinet maker)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, cabinet maker. Kentucky native. Son of John Ross and Amilia C. Ross. Married to Mildred Ann Mackey Ross in Oldham County, Kentucky, on July 19, 1847. Cabinet maker in Oldham County in 1850. Cabinet maker in Oldham County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Division 1, p. 144A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 904.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film 000482448.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 11347.
